thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Michelle

author: Michelle
title: Michelle
text:
Comprehensive, detailed website with great flight prices.
However, a flaw in their booking page is that the insurance section requires customers to scroll down to the last option in order to decline it. It seems intentionally placed that way to make money off people. I had to call and cancel the insurance which was added to my purchase. Very good customer service over the phone.
